code: import{fromJS}from"immutable";import*as constants from"./constants";var defaultState=fromJS({login:false,account:""});export default(function(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:defaultState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case constants.CHANGE_LOGIN:return state.merge({"login":action.result,"account":action.account});case constants.LOG_OUT:return state.set("login",action.result);default:return state;}});
